charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] headed to the beach,
where [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] spotted Avery.
charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_1201_0300:
Hold on! Permit me to use my psychic powers and
read your mind!
charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_0402_0800:
Hey! No disruptions, please—I’m trying to
concentrate.
charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_1201_1000:
I’ve met all kinds of psychics on Pasio, so I thought
I could finally do it this time...
charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_1201_1100:
As you can tell from my elegant appearance, I
come from a long-standing family of psychics.
charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_1201_1200:
You see, I’ve been destined to bear the burden of
Gym Leader since even before I was born.
charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_1201_1300:
However, I only know how to freely move things
with my mind.
charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_1201_1400:
This caused the rest of my family to label me
as a disappointment...
charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_1201_1600:
And then one time I did something that wasn’t
very elegant, which got me expelled from the
Gym...
charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_1201_1700: Slowpoke was my support during those hard times.
charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_0401_1900:
You still have much to learn, don’t you? They
aren’t merely cute.
charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_0402_2200: You are not aware of how great Slowpoke are?!
charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_1201_2300:
They are fazed by nothing! They just go about
their business at their own pace. They are
perfectly elegant!
charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_1201_2400:
I realized that I could learn from Slowpoke and
live as they do. Since then, I’ve come to develop
a great deal of respect for them!
charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_1201_2500:
Which is why even now, I’ll sometimes come
here...
charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_1201_2600: and take it easy with Slowpoke and company!
charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_1201_2700:
That being said, I can’t well just go about my
business at my own pace forever.
charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_1201_2800:
All the rigorous training I went through at the
Master Dojo has made me stronger, and now I am
ready to take things to the next level!
charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_1201_2900:
I shall become smarter, as Slowking does after
being bitten by Shellder!
charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_1201_3000: I’m a Psychic-type Gym Leader now, after all!
charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_1201_3100: Well, our Gym is still in the minor division.
charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_1201_3200:
Oh dear... Why did I just divulge so many of my
secrets?
charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_1201_3300:
OK, listen. Pretend to be a Slowpoke who just
used Amnesia and forget everything you just
heard.
charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_1201_3400:
And if you DO spill anything about what I just said
to anyone...
charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_1201_3500:
Well, let’s just say my psychic powers are
very potent.
charaepi_ch0273_00_savory/2301_1201_3600: Very well then. Goodbye for now!
